title: Leauge of legends unspection error please check logs for more information
body: Guys i downoladed league of legend and i get every time this error help me pls

replies.body: Where exactly are you receiving this error?  Can you provide a screenshot?  Happy to help with more info!

Thanks!  It looks like the error is happening at 33% which is when the patcher is trying to connect to the patching servers to download updates.  It looks like something is blocking it or causing a weak connection.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot for the fix.  Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qTl44AQr,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-08T19:59:03.583+0000)
>
> Thanks!  It looks like the error is happening at 33% which is when the patcher is trying to connect to the patching servers to download updates.  It looks like something is blocking it or causing a weak connection.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot for the fix.  Let me know if you have any questions.
